questionnaire.loseWeightDesc: Reduce body weight through healthy eating habits
questionnaire.gainWeightDesc: Increase body weight with nutritious, calorie-rich meals
questionnaire.maintainWeightDesc: Keep your current weight with balanced nutrition
questionnaire.improveHealthDesc: Focus on overall health and managing conditions
questionnaire.buildMuscleDesc: Increase muscle mass with protein-rich nutrition
questionnaire.easyDesc: Flexible approach with gradual lifestyle changes
questionnaire.moderateDesc: Balanced commitment with structured meal plans
questionnaire.strictDesc: Dedicated adherence to precise nutrition goals
questionnaire.notActiveDesc: Office work with minimal daily walking
questionnaire.lightlyActiveDesc: Walking, household chores, or light workouts 1-2 times per week
questionnaire.moderatelyActiveDesc: Regular workouts 3-5 times per week or physical job
questionnaire.veryActiveDesc: Intense daily workouts or demanding physical work
questionnaire.secondaryGoalPlaceholder: E.g., Improve sleep quality, increase energy levels...
questionnaire.cookedDesc: Enjoy preparing full meals from scratch
questionnaire.easyPrepDesc: Quick recipes with minimal cooking time
questionnaire.omnivoreDesc: Eat all types of foods without restrictions
questionnaire.lowCarbDesc: Reduce carbohydrate intake for weight management
questionnaire.ketoDesc: Very low carb, high fat diet for ketosis
questionnaire.vegetarianDesc: Plant-based diet including dairy and eggs
questionnaire.mediterraneanDesc: Heart-healthy diet rich in olive oil and fish
questionnaire.willingnessToFollowDesc: Commit to following the personalized meal plans
questionnaire.personalizedTipsDesc: Receive customized nutrition advice and insights
questionnaire.tip: üí° All your data is securely encrypted and used only to create your personalized nutrition plan.

questionnaire.planCreated: Your personalized nutrition plan has been created!

validation.allergenNotRecognized: This allergy is not recognized. Please enter a valid food allergy (e.g., peanuts, dairy, gluten).

tabs.home_description: Welcome to your nutrition dashboard! Here you can view your daily progress, recent meals, and quick access to all features. Use the toolbar to switch languages or get help on any page.
tabs.history_description: Review your past meals and track your eating patterns. Rate your meals, add notes, and learn from your nutrition journey. Use filters to find specific meals or time periods.
tabs.camera_description: Take photos of your meals to automatically log nutrition information. The AI will analyze your food and provide detailed nutritional breakdown. Make sure to capture the entire meal for accurate results.
tabs.profile_description: Manage your personal information, dietary preferences, and app settings. Update your goals, allergies, and notification preferences to customize your experience.
tabs.statistics_description: Track your nutritional progress with detailed charts and metrics. Monitor your intake of macronutrients, micronutrients, and lifestyle factors. Use the time filters to view daily, weekly, or monthly trends.
tabs.calendar_description: Plan your meals for the week ahead. View scheduled meals, track your nutrition goals, and see your eating patterns over time. Tap any date to add or view planned meals.
tabs.devices_description: Connect your fitness trackers and health apps to get a complete picture of your wellness. Sync data from Apple Health, Google Fit, Fitbit, and other supported devices.
tabs.food_scanner_description: Scan barcodes or upload food images to get instant nutrition information. Perfect for packaged foods and restaurant meals. The scanner works best with clear, well-lit images.
tabs.ai_chat_description: Chat with your personal AI nutrition assistant. Ask questions about food, get meal recommendations, and receive personalized advice based on your goals and dietary preferences.
tabs.recommended_menus_description: Discover personalized meal plans created just for you. Based on your dietary preferences, goals, and restrictions, these menus help you maintain a balanced and enjoyable diet.
tabs.welcome_description: Welcome to Calo Health! Your personal nutrition companion that helps you track meals, monitor your health goals, and get personalized nutrition recommendations. Start your journey to a healthier lifestyle today.
tabs.questionnaire_description: Complete your health profile to receive personalized nutrition recommendations. This questionnaire helps us understand your goals, lifestyle, and dietary needs.

help_support.title: Help & Support
help_support.welcome: Welcome to your nutrition tracking app! Here are some helpful tips:
help_support.tip_camera: Use the camera to scan your meals for automatic nutrition analysis
help_support.tip_water: Track your daily water intake to stay hydrated
help_support.tip_progress: View your progress in the statistics tab
help_support.tip_profile: Set up your profile in the questionnaire for personalized recommendations

about_app.title: About This App
about_app.description: A comprehensive nutrition tracking application that helps you monitor your daily food intake, track your health goals, and maintain a balanced diet.

devices.title: Smart Devices
devices.subtitle: Connect your fitness trackers and health apps for comprehensive wellness tracking
devices.connect_devices_description: Connect your wearables and health apps to automatically track your fitness data, calories burned, steps, and more.
devices.connect_devices_subtitle: Tap any device below to connect and start syncing your health data
devices.apple_health_desc: Automatically syncs with iPhone Health app for seamless data integration
devices.google_fit_desc: Connect your Google Fit account to track activities across Android devices
devices.fitbit_desc: Sync your Fitbit tracker data including steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns
devices.garmin_desc: Import detailed fitness metrics from your Garmin watch or device
devices.whoop_desc: Track recovery, strain, and sleep metrics from your Whoop strap
devices.polar_desc: Connect Polar devices for advanced heart rate and training data
devices.samsung_health_desc: Sync health data from Samsung Galaxy devices and Galaxy Watch
devices.secure_data_processing: All data is processed securely with end-to-end encryption
devices.disconnect_confirmation: Are you sure you want to disconnect this device?
devices.disconnect_warning: This will stop syncing data from this device.
devices.data_privacy: Your health data is encrypted and never shared with third parties
devices.battery_optimization: Enable battery optimization for better device performance

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these terms carefully before using Calo. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance_of_terms.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance_of_terms.content: By creating an account or using Calo, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description_of_service.title: Description of Service
description_of_service.content: Calo is a personal nutrition tracking application that helps users monitor their dietary intake, set health goals, and track their wellness journey. The service is provided for personal, non-commercial use only.

user_accounts.title: User Accounts
user_accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account.

acceptable_use.title: Acceptable Use
acceptable_use.content: You agree to use Calo only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. The following uses are prohibited:

subsections.title: Prohibited Activities
subsections.content: You may not:
items: Use the service for any illegal purpose or in violation of any laws
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
Upload malicious code, viruses, or any harmful software
Harass, abuse, or harm other users
Impersonate any person or entity
Scrape, mine, or collect data from the service without permission

subsections.title: Content Standards
subsections.content: Any content you submit must:
items: Be accurate and truthful to the best of your knowledge
Not violate any third-party rights
Not contain offensive, inappropriate, or harmful material
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

subscription_and_payment.title: Subscription & Payment
subscription_and_payment.content: Calo offers both free and premium subscription tiers. Payment terms and subscription details are as follows:

subsections.title: Billing
subsections.content: Premium subscriptions are billed on a recurring basis:
items: Monthly subscriptions renew automatically each month
Annual subscriptions renew automatically each year
You will be charged at the beginning of each billing cycle
Prices are subject to change with 30 days notice

subsections.title: Cancellation
subsections.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time:
items: Cancellations take effect at the end of the current billing period
No refunds for partial periods
You retain access to premium features until the end of your paid period
Free tier services remain available after cancellation

subsections.title: Refund Policy
subsections.content: Refunds are generally not provided except:
items: Technical issues preventing service access for extended periods
Billing errors or unauthorized charges
As required by applicable law
At our sole discretion on a case-by-case basis

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All content, features, and functionality of Calo, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are the property of Calo and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

user_content.title: User Content
user_content.content: You retain ownership of any content you submit to Calo. However, by submitting content, you grant us certain rights:

subsections.title: License Grant
subsections.content: You grant Calo a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to:
items: Store and process your content to provide our services
Use anonymized and aggregated data for service improvements
Display your content within the app as part of the service
Back up your content for data protection purposes

subsections.title: Your Responsibilities
subsections.content: You are solely responsible for:
items: The accuracy of information you provide
Ensuring you have rights to any content you upload
Complying with all applicable laws regarding your content
Maintaining backups of important information

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Important limitations and disclaimers about our service:

subsections.title: No Medical Advice
subsections.content: Calo is not a substitute for professional medical advice:
items: We do not provide medical, diagnostic, or treatment services
Information provided is for general wellness purposes only
Always consult healthcare professionals for medical decisions
We are not responsible for health outcomes based on app use

subsections.title: Service Availability
subsections.content: We provide the service 'as is' and 'as available':
items: We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service
Features may change, be suspended, or discontinued
Scheduled maintenance may cause temporary unavailability
We reserve the right to modify the service at any time

limitation_of_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_of_liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Calo and its affiliates shall not be liable for:

subsections.title: Types of Damages
subsections.content: We are not liable for:
items: Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
Personal injury or health issues
Damages resulting from service interruptions or errors
Any damages exceeding the amount you paid us in the past 12 months

subsections.title: Your Acknowledgment
subsections.content: By using Calo, you acknowledge:
items: Use of the service is at your sole risk
You are responsible for your health decisions
We provide information tools, not medical advice
Results may vary and are not guaranteed

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Calo, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses arising from your use of the service or violation of these terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the service:

subsections.title: Grounds for Termination
subsections.content: We may terminate your account if:
items: You violate these Terms of Service
You engage in fraudulent or illegal activities
You abuse or misuse the service
Your account remains inactive for an extended period
Required by law or regulatory authorities

subsections.title: Effect of Termination
subsections.content: Upon termination:
items: Your access to the service will be immediately revoked
You may request a copy of your data within 30 days
We may delete your data after the retention period
Outstanding payments remain due
Provisions that should survive termination will remain in effect

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where Calo is registered, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of that jurisdiction.

changes_to_terms.title: Changes to Terms
changes_to_terms.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or in-app notification. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact_information.title: Contact Information
contact_information.content: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@calohealth.com or through our in-app support channels. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours.

footer.title: Related Documents
footer.subtitle: View our other legal documents and policies

Track, analyze, and optimize your diet

welcome.description: Discover personalized nutrition recommendations, track your meals with AI assistance, and achieve your wellness goals with Calo Health.

network.title: Connection Error
network.suggestion: Check your internet connection and try again

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.suggestion: Try again with a clearer image or simplify your request

server.title: Server Error
server.suggestion: Please try again in a few minutes

auth.title: Authentication Error
auth.message: Please sign in again to continue

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.suggestion: Check your input and try again

menuGeneration.title: Menu Generation Failed
menuGeneration.suggestion: Try with different ingredients or simpler descriptions. Ensure ingredients match your dietary preferences (e.g., tuna is not vegetarian).

dietary.title: Dietary Preference Conflict
dietary.suggestion: Check that your selected ingredients match your dietary preferences. For example: fish and tuna are not suitable for vegetarian diets.

water.title: Water Intake
water.subtitle: Stay hydrated today
water.selectBottleDesc: Choose how much water you drank
water.tip: Drinking water regularly helps maintain energy levels and supports your metabolism. Aim for at least 8 cups (2L) per day.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use Calo.

regulatory_scope.title: Regulatory Scope
regulatory_scope.content: Calo is designed as a personal nutrition tracking tool and does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Our service complies with applicable data protection regulations.

subsections.title: Not Medical Device
subsections.content: Calo is not a medical device and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

subsections.title: General Wellness
subsections.content: Our app provides general wellness information and nutrition tracking features for personal use only.

subsections.title: Consult Healthcare Providers
subsections.content: Always consult with qualified healthcare professionals before making any health-related decisions.

sensitive_data.title: Sensitive Data Collection
sensitive_data.content: We collect and process the following types of data to provide our services:

subsections.title: Health Information
subsections.content: We collect health-related data that you voluntarily provide:
items: Daily food intake and nutritional information
Weight, height, and body measurements
Activity levels and exercise data
Dietary preferences and restrictions
Health goals and wellness targets

subsections.title: Personal Information
subsections.content: Basic information to create and manage your account:
items: Name and email address
Age and gender (optional)
Profile picture (optional)
Account preferences and settings

subsections.title: Usage Data
subsections.content: Information about how you use our app:
items: App interaction patterns
Feature usage statistics
Device information and operating system
Session duration and frequency

liability_limitation.title: Liability Limitation
liability_limitation.content: Calo provides information and tools for personal use. We are not liable for any health outcomes or decisions made based on information from our app. Use of our service is at your own risk.

cookies_analytics.title: Cookies & Analytics
cookies_analytics.content: We use cookies and analytics to improve our service and understand how users interact with Calo. You can manage cookie preferences in your device settings.

data_storage.title: Data Storage & Security
data_storage.content: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or loss.

user_rights.title: Your Rights
user_rights.content: You have control over your personal data. We respect your privacy rights and provide you with the following options:

subsections.title: Access Your Data
subsections.content: You can view and download all personal data we have about you at any time through your account settings.

subsections.title: Delete Your Data
subsections.content: You can request complete deletion of your account and all associated data. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

subsections.title: Modify Your Information
subsections.content: You can update or correct your personal information at any time through your profile settings.

subsections.title: Data Portability
subsections.content: You can export your data in a machine-readable format to transfer to another service if desired.

contact_info.title: Contact Information
contact_info.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at privacy@calohealth.com or through our support channels.

footer.title: Third-Party Services
footer.subtitle: Learn more about our partners' privacy policies
